special_text:
During your turn, Helene is a 4/4 Human Warrior creature with hexproof and trample that’s still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her during your turn.
[+2]: Conjure a card named Quicken or a card named Spur into your hand. [i](They’re instants that cost {U} and {G} respectively that draw a card and give your next sorcery or creature spell flash.)[/i]
[0]: Choose target creature. Helene deals damage equal to her power that creature, then loses loyalty counters equal to that creature’s power.
